words.source: H3588 conj. ki 'for, because'; KJV 'for', ESV 'for', NASB 'for'
H6258 adv. ʿattah 'now'; KJV 'now', ESV 'by now', NASB 'by now'
H7971 Qal perf. 1cs of שָׁלַח 'to send, stretch out'; KJV 'I will stretch out', ESV 'I could have put forth', NASB 'I could have stretched out'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3027 n.fs constr. yad 'hand' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'my hand', ESV 'my hand', NASB 'my hand'
H5221 waw + Hiphil wayyiqtol 1cs of נָכָה 'to strike'; KJV 'and smitten', ESV 'and struck', NASB 'and struck'
H853 direct object marker + 2ms suff.; KJV 'thee', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'
H853 waw + direct object marker; KJV 'and', ESV 'and', NASB 'and'
H5971 n.ms constr. ʿam 'people' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'thy people', ESV 'your people', NASB 'your people'
H1698 prep. b- + art. + n.ms dever 'pestilence'; KJV 'with pestilence', ESV 'with pestilence', NASB 'with pestilence'

words.phrase: and you would have been cut off
words.source: H3582 waw + Niphal wayyiqtol 2ms of כָּחַד 'to be hidden, destroyed'; KJV 'and thou shalt be cut off', ESV 'and you would have been cut off', NASB 'and you would have been cut off'
H4480 prep. min 'from'; KJV 'from', ESV 'from', NASB 'from'
H776 art. + n.fs ʾerets 'land, earth'; KJV 'the earth', ESV 'the earth', NASB 'the earth'
